mapper.select: select * from (select c.*, rownum col_no from (select a.mem_id, a.mem_name, a.profile_path, b.job_position, b.corporate_name from (select user_id as mem_id, user_name as mem_name, profile_path from users) a, career_info b where a.mem_id = b.user_id(+) and (a.mem_name like '%'|| #{search_word} ||'%' or b.corporate_name like '%'|| #{search_word} ||'%') ) c) where col_no between ((#{page}-1) * #{pageSize}) + 1 and #{page} * #{pageSize}

select * from (select c.*, rownum col_no from (select a.mem_id, a.mem_name, a.profile_path from (select corp_id as mem_id, corp_name as mem_name, logo_path as profile_path from corporation) a, career_info b where a.mem_id = b.user_id(+) and (a.mem_name like '%'|| #{search_word} ||'%' or b.corporate_name like '%'|| #{search_word} ||'%') ) c) where col_no between ((#{page}-1) * #{pageSize}) + 1 and #{page} * #{pageSize}
